Mastering the art of simplicity!

Hello, I'm Iasmina. I'm a multi-talented human that design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.
I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my skills one day at a time.
I am also baking delicious sweets in my free time.

View more

Specialize in

Living, learning and leveling up one day at a time.

Concepting

I've always been someone who has both a creative and a logical side. I use my creative side to design and my logical side to code. I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions.

UI/UX

I believe it is important to understand both design and development to achieve a successful user-facing product. By involving a front-end developer at the design & prototyping phase, technical challenges can be solved early.

development

I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser. I write standards based code that is semantic, accessible, easy to maintain, cross browser compatible, and performant.

Interaction

I take full responsibility for turning in my work on time and find the right balance between quality work and quality time at home with my family. Always committed to completing tasks in a timely and quality manner.
